name: Lycan
description:
After years of lycan reign, humans have concocted a potion which reverses the curse of the lycan. Armed with this new weapon the humans have a chance to eradicate their enemy.

Will you be the bloodthirsty lycan and prey on fragile humans, or will you gather up your courage and revolt against the beasts of the night? Only one race will survive!

Developed by Neumont University students
